text: The Scarlet Dove is a 1928 American silent drama film directed by Arthur Gregor and starring Lowell Sherman, Robert Frazer and Josephine Borio.Weaver p.215 ==Cast== * Lowell Sherman as Ivan Orloff * Robert Frazer as Alexis Petroff * Josephine Borio as Mara * Margaret Livingston as Olga * Shirley Palmer as Eve * Carlos Durand as Gregory * Julia Swayne Gordon as The Aunt ==Preservation status== *The film is preserved by the BFI National Film and Television Archive, London.The Library of Congress/FIAF American Silent Feature Film Survival Catalog:The Scarlet Dove ==References== ==Bibliography== * Weaver, John T. Twenty Years of Silents, 1908-1928. Scarecrow Press, 1971. ==External links== * * Category:1928 films Category:1928 drama films Category:American films Category:American drama films Category:Films directed by Arthur Gregor Category:American silent feature films Category:English- language films Category:Tiffany Pictures films Category:Films set in Russia Category:American black-and-white films
title: The Scarlet Dove (1928 film)
